text: Ahhh okay, I like the sound of that competitive working environment and the speed in which your pushed to work at.. Did you always feel like you wanted to become a texture and look-Dev artist?

It is a very competitive industry, which suits me too! I used to work for madame Tussauds, designing their experiences worldwide but I fancied a career change. So I started training to become a modeller but someone suggested I try texturing and I never looked back
